case.title: Looking for a Queen - 25 (London)
case.text:
Hello,
I'm posting here hoping to find an attractive lady who wants to build a long-term friendship with a handsome, young man and see where things go... I enjoy eating out and sometimes I like visiting art exhibitions. I take care of my personal appearance and I like to work-out.
I'm looking for a smart woman, who knows how to let her hair down and enjoy life.
J
